```{r, static_plot, fig.width = 10, fig.height = 6}

trips_df %>%
  mutate(`Trip Duration (min)` = duration_sec / 60) %>%
  filter(`Trip Duration (min)` <= 60) %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = `Trip Duration (min)`)) +
  theme_bw() +
  geom_histogram(binwidth = 1) +
  ylab('# Trips')
```
